headline: Commitment 2022: One-on-one with GOP governor candidate Lou Barletta
sentences: Pittsburgh's Action News 4 anchor Shannon Perrine spoke one-on-one with the former mayor of Hazelton and former businessman about what he would do if he got the job of governor.
Pittsburgh's Action News 4 anchor Shannon Perrine spoke one-on-one with the former mayor of Hazelton and former businessman about what he would do if he got the job of governor.
Former congressman Lou Barletta is one of 10 candidates seeking the Republican nomination for governor of Pennsylvania.

4 GOP candidates for governor set rules to join a debate
